channel.title: CVE Feed for HP Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HP Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-31635|2024-08-03T07:26:00.589Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: Potential time-of-check to time-of-use (TOCTOU) vulnerabilities have been identified in the BIOS for certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, escalation of privilege, denial of service, and information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-23453|2024-08-03T03:43:45.915Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20support%20assistant
item.description: Potential security vulnerabilities have been identified in HP Support Assistant. These vulnerabilities include privilege escalation, compromise of integrity, allowed communication with untrusted clients, and unauthorized modification of files.

item.title: CVE-2022-31642|2024-08-03T07:26:01.150Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the system BIOS of certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, escalation of privilege, denial of service, and information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-4894|2024-08-03T01:55:45.868Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20and%20samsung%20printer%20software
item.description: Certain HP and Samsung Printer software packages may potentially be vulnerable to elevation of privilege due to Uncontrolled Search Path Element.

item.title: CVE-2022-31637|2024-08-03T07:26:01.298Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: Potential time-of-check to time-of-use (TOCTOU) vulnerabilities have been identified in the BIOS for certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, escalation of privilege, denial of service, and information disclosure.

item.description: Potential Time-of-Check to Time-of Use (TOCTOU) vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP BIOS for certain HP PC products which may allow arbitrary code execution, denial of service, and information disclosure.

item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the system BIOS for certain HP PC products which may allow loss of integrity. HP is releasing firmware updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.description: Certain HP PageWide Pro Printers may be vulnerable to a potential denial of service attack.

item.title: CVE-2022-3990|2024-08-03T01:27:53.921Z -- hp%20inc. -- hpsfviewer
item.description: HPSFViewer might allow Escalation of Privilege. This potential vulnerability was remediated on July 29th, 2022. Customers who opted for automatic updates should have already received the remediation.

item.description: Potential security vulnerabilities have been identified in HP Support Assistant. These vulnerabilities include privilege escalation, compromise of integrity, allowed communication with untrusted clients, and unauthorized modification of files.

item.title: CVE-2022-27537|2024-08-03T05:32:59.263Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the system BIOS of certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, escalation of privilege, denial of service, and information disclosure. HP is releasing BIOS updates to mitigate these potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2022-27540|2024-08-03T05:32:59.640Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: A potential Time-of-Check to Time-of Use (TOCTOU) vulnerability has been identified in the HP BIOS for certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, denial of service, and information disclosure. HP is releasing BIOS updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-6138|2024-08-02T08:21:17.709Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20workstation%20pcs
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the system BIOS for certain HP Workstation PCs, which might allow escalation of privilege, arbitrary code execution, or denial of service. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28893|2024-08-02T01:03:50.249Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20software%20packages%20%28softpaqs%29
item.description: Certain HP software packages (SoftPaqs) are potentially vulnerable to arbitrary code execution when the SoftPaq configuration file has been modified after extraction. HP has released updated software packages (SoftPaqs).

item.title: CVE-2024-29080|2024-08-02T01:03:51.767Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20display%20control
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP Display Control software component within the HP Application Enabling Software Driver which might allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-27460|2024-08-02T00:34:52.265Z -- hp%20inc. -- plantronics%20hub
item.description: A privilege escalation exists in the updater for Plantronics Hub 3.25.1 and below.

item.title: CVE-2024-3281|2024-08-01T20:05:08.210Z -- hp%20inc. -- poly%20ccx%20devices
item.description: A vulnerability was discovered in the firmware builds after 8.0.2.3267 and prior to 8.1.3.1301 in CCX devices. A flaw in the firmware build process did not properly restrict access to a resource from an unauthorized actor.

item.title: CVE-2024-4143|2024-08-01T20:33:52.408Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20pc%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in certain HP PC products using AMI BIOS, which might allow arbitrary code execution. AMI has released firmware updates to mitigate this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1695|2024-08-01T18:48:21.737Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20application%20enabling%20software%20driver
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP Application Enabling Software Driver for certain HP PC products, which might allow escalation of privilege. HP is releasing software updates to mitigate this potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-0794|2024-08-01T18:18:18.528Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20laserjet%20pro%2C%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to Remote Code Execution due to buffer overflow when rendering fonts embedded in a PDF file.

item.title: CVE-2024-1869|2024-08-01T18:56:21.990Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20designjet
item.description: Certain HP DesignJet print products are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure related to accessing memory out-of-bounds when using the general-purpose gateway (GGW) over port 9220.

item.title: CVE-2024-0407|2024-08-01T18:04:49.658Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20enterprise%20laserjet%2C%20hp%20laserjet%20managed%20printers
item.description: Certain HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure, when connections made by the device back to services enabled by some solutions may have been trusted without the appropriate CA certificate in the device's certificate store.

item.title: CVE-2024-1174|2024-08-01T18:33:24.143Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20thinpro%208.0
item.description: Previous versions of HP ThinPro (prior to HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8) could potentially contain security vulnerabilities. HP has released HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8, which includes updates to mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

item.title: CVE-2024-29080|2024-07-26T15:23:58.604Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20display%20control
item.description: Potential vulnerabilities have been identified in the HP Display Control software component within the HP Application Enabling Software Driver which might allow escalation of privilege.

item.title: CVE-2024-2301|2024-07-24T16:55:37.063Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20laserjet%20pro%20devices
item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro devices are potentially vulnerable to a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attack via the web management interface of the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-2300|2024-07-19T19:52:09.327Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20advance%20mobile%20application
item.description: HP Advance Mobile Applications for iOS and Android are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure when using an outdated version of the application via mobile devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-4143|2024-07-15T21:46:41.838Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20pc%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in certain HP PC products using AMI BIOS, which might allow arbitrary code execution. AMI has released firmware updates to mitigate this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-27540|2024-06-28T19:00:28.307Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: A potential Time-of-Check to Time-of Use (TOCTOU) vulnerability has been identified in the HP BIOS for certain HP PC products, which might allow arbitrary code execution, denial of service, and information disclosure. HP is releasing BIOS updates to mitigate the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-5410|2024-03-12T20:01:46.531Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20pc%20bios
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been reported in the system BIOS of certain HP PC products, which might allow memory tampering. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-4063|2024-06-04T17:27:20.275Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20officejet%20pro%20printers
item.description: Certain HP OfficeJet Pro printers are potentially vulnerable to a Denial of Service when using an improper eSCL URL GET request.

item.title: CVE-2023-6138|2024-02-14T22:12:16.966Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20workstation%20pcs
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the system BIOS for certain HP Workstation PCs, which might allow escalation of privilege, arbitrary code execution, or denial of service. HP is releasing mitigation for the potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28893|2024-06-04T18:03:29.967Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20software%20packages%20%28softpaqs%29
item.description: Certain HP software packages (SoftPaqs) are potentially vulnerable to arbitrary code execution when the SoftPaq configuration file has been modified after extraction. HP has released updated software packages (SoftPaqs).

item.title: CVE-2024-5143|2024-06-04T18:02:37.631Z -- hp%20inc. -- certain%20hp%20laserjet%20pro%20printers
item.description: A user with device administrative privileges can change existing SMTP server settings on the device, without having to re-enter SMTP server credentials. By redirecting send-to-email traffic to the new server, the original SMTP server credentials may potentially be exposed.

item.title: CVE-2024-1869|2024-03-01T21:31:06.701Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20designjet
item.description: Certain HP DesignJet print products are potentially vulnerable to information disclosure related to accessing memory out-of-bounds when using the general-purpose gateway (GGW) over port 9220.

item.title: CVE-2024-1695|2024-05-06T20:47:35.746Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20application%20enabling%20software%20driver
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in the HP Application Enabling Software Driver for certain HP PC products, which might allow escalation of privilege. HP is releasing software updates to mitigate this potential vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1174|2024-03-01T19:39:26.840Z -- hp%20inc. -- hp%20thinpro%208.0
item.description: Previous versions of HP ThinPro (prior to HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8) could potentially contain security vulnerabilities. HP has released HP ThinPro 8.0 SP 8, which includes updates to mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

item.description: Certain HP LaserJet Pro, HP Enterprise LaserJet, and HP LaserJet Managed Printers are potentially vulnerable to Remote Code Execution due to buffer overflow when rendering fonts embedded in a PDF file.
